desc: ZKC, allias Zhang Kong, is the sole official weightlifting equipment supplier of Beijing 2008, Rio 2016, and Tokyo 2021 Olympic Games. Since more than 40 years, ZKC is improving in design, product, manufacturing and service of IWF approved and World Para Powerlifing approved weightlifting and powerlifting equipment.

layout.text: THE WORLD'S BEST ATHLETES TRAIN AND COMPETE WITH ZKC EQUIPMENT
